document_data.name: K'rr'zaalt
document_data.mainbody: '''K'rr'zaalt''' was a [[cleric]] and spiritual leader of the [[Kron'ikl]] tribe of [[pterafolk]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
document_data.Activities: K'rr'zaalt's predecessor, a [[spirit naga]] chieftain, was slain by adventurers, leaving the Kron'ikl tribe in complete disarray. K'rr'zaalt had been taught the dogma of [[Shekinester]] and took control of the tribe when no other leaders stepped forward. K'rr'zaalt was affirmed several months later at a meeting of spirit naga chieftains. He later attended the same meeting, called the [[Great Conclave]], on a regular basis and was the only pterafolk in attendance. Many of the spirit nagas resented him for this and plotted to wrest control of the Kron'ikl from him.
document_data.Possessions: K'rr'zaalt wielded an enchanted [[heavy mace]] and [[heavy crossbow]]. He owned a ''[[cloak of resistance]], [[bracers of armor]]'', and two [[scroll]]s of ''[[cure moderate wounds]]''.
